properties.name: episodic simulation
properties.definition_text:
the construction of a detailed mental representation of a specific autobiographical future event

(from Szpunar, K.K., Spreng, R.N., & Schacter, D.L. (2014). A taxonomy of prospection: introducing an organizational framework for future-oriented cognition. Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America, 111 52, 18414-21)
